column1: Smoque BBQ////As far as the food goes
column2: AWESOME! Meat had great smoke flavor
column3: ribs had good bark on it
column4: didn't even need sauce. Slaw was freshly made and and not running the mill. Cornbread and Mac and cheese were a hit and to top it off the Peach Cobbler and (my fav) Bread Pudding were outstanding!
